channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Run down Brits battle with coughs and colds for nearly half the year
item.description: A new study of 2,000 adults has revealed that Brits feel 'in good health' just 42% of the time, with the rest of the time spent battling various ailme...

item.title: Taxidermist turns rats into ‘sexy showgirls’ with nipple covers and fake eyelashes
item.description: 'When people come up to me they gasp or they clutch their pearls when they see what I have made and they get really excited, I love it so much.'

item.title: Eating sweets and biscuits can make our mental health worse, research suggests
item.description: UK Biobank data on 180,000 adults reveals depression risk linked to eating a lot of sugary treats such as biscuits, cakes and pastries

item.title: People have some questions about ‘188-year-old man found living in a cave’
item.description: A video of the frail-looking man has gone viral.

item.title: Woman finds entire potato in ‘damp’ bag of Greggs crisps
item.description: Despite it causing the office to be in hysterics, the smell and dampness of the bag was rather concerning.

item.title: Supermarket hack will let you unlock your trolley even if you don't have £1 coin
item.description: A social media user has shared a photo of a supermarket trolley and people are only just realising what the hooks are often used for - and it's safe t...

item.title: Hurricane Milton hitting Florida leaves expert in tears as 'we knew it was coming'
item.description: Florida meteorologist John Morales says it was the knowledge of the impact the Category Five superstorm will have that left him almost overcome with e...

item.title: Primark shoppers pleased to see 'warm and cosy' £18 leopard fleece back in stock
item.description: The fluffy fleece sold out quickly when it first hit the shelves but it's starting to appear back in stock around the UK

item.title: Two women ‘kicked off a plane for wearing revealing’ crop tops
item.description: A flight attendant asked them to follow the airlines dress code.
